qsmp.subtitle: Design an informative website reflecting the atmosphere of the QSMP Minecraft server

context.title: Context
context.description1: QSMP is a multiplayer Minecraft server, created by the content creator <creator>Quackity</creator>, which brings together streamers from all over the world, speaking different languages, thanks to a real-time translation system.
context.description2: Their QSMP.co website was designed to bring together all the server's main information: online streamers, a countdown to the next server event, the list of members and their various social networks.

contribution.title: Contribution
contribution.description: Quackity's team commissioned me to design the entire showcase site, from visual identity to final interface. I also had the opportunity to interact with the developer throughout the production phase to ensure consistency between the mock-ups and the final product.

qsmp_shop.subtitle: Showcasing the first QSMP figurine collection on an online store

context.title: Context
context.description1: QSMP is a multiplayer Minecraft server, created by the content creator <creator>Quackity</creator>, which brings together streamers from all over the world, speaking different languages, thanks to a real-time translation system.
context.description2: <shop>QSMP.shop</shop> is the QSMP e-commerce site, selling merchandise related to the project. Unfortunately, this design was never put online, but it was nevertheless finalized.

contribution.title: Contribution
contribution.description: I was commissioned to design an entire Shopify site dedicated to the first collection of figurines inspired by the series' characters. As each character has a unique identity and story, I took care to reflect their uniqueness through the product cards and details pages.

buddy.subtitle: Create a friendly mascot to embody a data access chatbot

context.title: Context
context.description: Data Supermarket is a tool developed by Carrefour to simplify access to business data via a structured catalog. It integrates a chatbot that allows users to obtain information by interacting directly with it.

contribution.title: Contribution
contribution.description1: I was asked to design an illustration and give a visual identity to this chatbot. The aim was to move away from the codes of classic call assistants, adopting a more informal, youthful and friendly approach, in line with the interface already designed.
contribution.description2: To create these illustrations, I was inspired by the emotional palette of Apple's Memoji, while integrating Carrefour's emblematic colors, blue and red, as well as the pastel hues of the Data Supermarket interface.

context.title: Context
context.description1: Totoro is an application designed to encourage local exchanges and re-energize community life.
context.description2: As a reward for completing a local mission, users earn tokens that can then be exchanged for discount vouchers to be used at local retailers.

contribution.title: Contribution
contribution.description1: During this project, I had the opportunity to create the visual identity. Together with the second designer, I also co-constructed the user path, a design kit and all the mobile app's screens.

bescherelle.subtitle: Rethinking a mobile application into a web solution

context.title: Context
context.description1: Mon Coach Bescherelle is a spelling and writing training tool created by Hatier.
context.description2: Its main problem was its accessibility. The tool was only available as a smartphone application. My mission was therefore to make it available on the Educadhoc educational platform, while taking into account the constraints imposed by its layout.

contribution.title: Contribution
contribution.description: After analyzing all the contents of the mobile application and the various possibilities of the Educadhoc platform, I was able to start iterating on the required interfaces, through feedback from the internal teams, all the way through to this final version.
